HOME.BACKGROUND: Background image containing ships lined up on a pier
HOME.TITLE: WE ARE THE W2J INTERNATIONAL COMMERCE
HOME.CONTENT: A company created to provide consultant on international trades. Here we present the best cost reduction solutions for your imports, both in terms of logistics and taxation, all of it in a legal and transparent manner. We are a highly qualified team committed to making your business viable and prosperous.

TEXT.WORLD: W2J Comércio Internacional, was born with the objective of reducing the costs of its imports, studying the subject discovered an ethical, safe and efficient way to carry out import operations. And why not extend such knowledge to the national market, providing cost reduction benefits and increasing market share. He then decided to offer and share with international trade.
TEXT.LOGISTIC: In imports, the costs of taxes, fees and customs expenses are very high, mainly ICMS, which is the biggest cost in the chain. What we can and will do is reduce this and other costs. Want to know how? Contact us and you will be surprised when you receive the comparative spreadsheet with your last import.

ARTICLE.VISION-CONTENT: Obtain the trust and credibility of our customers, investors and partners as the best option for import and export operations in Brazil. In two years we will have our first branch abroad. Provide ethical, professional, intellectual and financial growth to our employees and partners.
ARTICLE.MISSION-CONTENT: To be an integral part of the importing or exporting client, advising, managing their operations and enabling their business to be prosperous.
ARTICLE.VALUE-CONTENT: We are committed to transparency, quality in decision making, always aiming at the best results for our customers. We believe that transparency, simplicity and common sense guide better than sophistication and complexity. We always work to ensure the best operational solution for our customers.
